alert.note: Alert for Springfield Vicinity, Baca County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 16 at 10:20PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A large area of rain with embedded thunder will continue over Baca County through 1100 PM MDT... At 1016 PM MDT, Doppler radar continued to show a large area of light to moderate rain over nearly all of Baca county. Radar along with observed reports indicate 1.5 to 2.5 inches of rain has fallen across a good portion of Baca county. The rain will decrease across the region around midnight. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph along with periods of light to moderate rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Ponding of water on rural roadways is likely occurring across Baca county. Locations impacted include... Vilas and Walsh. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
